content:
TaskOptions TaskOptions Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll

Specifies the options for creating Tasks.

Edit

In this Article

[Flags]
public enum TaskOptions<Flags>
Public Enum TaskOptions
Attributes
FlagsAttribute

Fields

DoNotCancelOnJobFailure DoNotCancelOnJobFailure

Specifies that the task will not be cancelled even if the corresponding job failed
DoNotDeleteOutputAssetOnFailure DoNotDeleteOutputAssetOnFailure

Specifies that the output asset will not be deleted even if the task failed
None None

Specifies no creation options.
ProtectedConfiguration ProtectedConfiguration

Specifies that the Task's configuration should be encrypted.
